name: NCBI/NLM Journal Archiving and Interchange Document Type Definition (DTD), version 1.0 and 1.1

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: An XML-based specification for journal articles, developed by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI), a division of the National Library of Medicine (NLM) and intended as a common format in which publishers and archives can exchange final journal content.
